short_summary: Conducting the election of the Algonquins of Barriere Lake Band Council consisting of a Chief and six Councillors elected by a majority of the votes of the electors of the Band, in accordance with the Indian Act and the Indian Band Election Regulations.
description: Conducting the election of the Algonquins of Barriere Lake Band Council consisting of a Chief and six Councillors elected by a majority of the votes of the electors of the Band, in accordance with the Indian Act and the Indian Band Election Regulations.
